option.value:
☰

Travel and Accommodations

Our wedding will take place at Quaker Ridge Golf Club in Scarsdale, NY. This is about 45 minutes north of Manhattan. Quaker Ridge is conveniently accessible by car (just off the Hutchinson River Parkway and near I-95), by train (Metro-North’s Scarsdale and Hartsdale stations are the closest), and by plane (LGA is about a 30–40 minute drive; JFK and EWR are also options). Transportation will also be provided to/from the wedding from the below hotel.

Please let us know if you have any questions regarding travel. We're looking forward to celebrating with you!

Hotel

Loews Regency New York

540 Park Ave, New York, NY 10065 | (212) 759-4100

Book Here

Transportation will be provided for guests staying at the Loews Regency Hotel to and from Quaker Ridge Golf Club

Flight

LaGuardia Airport, John F. Kennedy International Airport, or Newark Liberty International Airport
